mapper.select: SELECT t_user.id, t_user.`name`, t_user.`password`, t_user.salt, t_user.state, t_user.username, t_role.id, t_role.available, t_role.description, t_role.role FROM t_user RIGHT JOIN t_user_role ON t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role ON t_user_role.role_id = t_role.id WHERE username=#{username}
